Description:
SUPERIOR FAMILY HOME
This gorgeous, light filled and neat home has all the modern conveniences you desire. With an impressive facade and landscaped gardens this superior family home lies peacefully in a quiet location on a large 721m2 block.
With a functional and practical floor plan, the home features 3 living areas and 4 well sized bedrooms. The master bedroom with full ensuite and walk in robe, whilst remaining bedrooms are generously proportioned and complemented by built in robes and the stylish family bathroom. The centrally appointed kitchen boasts an abundance of both bench and cupboard space with a glass splashback, 900mm oven, gas cooktop, 40mm stone benchtop as well as a walk-in pantry. The kitchen ideally overlooks the family living/dining area, making entertaining and interacting with guests a breeze. There's room for the kids too! Be just as impressed with the outside, the HUGE pergola is definitely the entertainers delight. Enjoy BBQ'S with family and friends all year round! OR use the rear roller door and utilize the pergola as a shelter for those with an extra car, trailer or toys.
This fabulous family home offers so many extras:
- Two Driveways
- Three living areas
- Remote controlled double garage and rear roller door
- Gas Ducted Heating
- 4 x Split System Air Conditioner
- Large outdoor pergola
- Surround Sound System
- Downlights
- Landscaped front and rear yard
In the sought after Brookland Greens Estate sits this fantastic & modern family home. Surrounded by golf clubs and multiple recreational areas this is the faultless location for the family to get involved in activities. With close proximity to all amenities that Cranbourne has to offer: Cranbourne Shopping Centre, local schools, the beautiful Royal Botanic Cranbourne Gardens and public transport, you don't want to miss out on this one.
